short_summary: Request for Proposal for the optical design of laser sources for counter-measure applications, target designation and target identification, modification of existing laser sources, testing and simulation tools development.
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on April 11th 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
=====================================

# Tender Announcement: W7714-228357

## Title
Modification and Testing of Electro-Optic Systems

## Reference Number
WS3855274175-Doc3856776501

## Solicitation Number
WS3855274175

### Details
* Tender Closing Date: April 11th, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not Specified
* Tender Status: Expired

## Notice
Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of Defense Research and Development Canada, invites qualified suppliers to respond to this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the optical design of laser sources used in counter-measure (CM) applications. The successful bidder will be responsible for the modification of existing laser sources, testing of laser sources in a controlled and safe environment, and the development of simulation tools for laser propagation and interaction.

## Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Service (SRV)
* Procurement Method: Competitive, Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Quebec

## Contact Information

* Daniel Boisclair, SPAC/PSPC
* Email: [daniel.boisclair@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daniel.boisclair@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not Available

## Additional Information

* All bids must be submitted electronically.
* Services and Procurement Canada reserves the right to reject any bid.
* Complete tender documentation is available on the Ariba Discovery website.

Note: I changed the format to make it easier to read and understand. I also rephrased some of the sentences to make them more concise and clear. I left out the additional information at the end of the original text, as it was not relevant to the main announcement.  Please make sure you are going to stick to the original text - I have removed or reworded some lines.
